segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, everything seems so ordinary at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is polishing that plate like it's the most important thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But water is gushing from the faucet, filling the sink to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why hasn't she turned it off? It's flooding the floor now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, standing right in the mess with her foot wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, climbing up to steal cookies like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is tilting back dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall and hurt himself any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting there, encouraging him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked, what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's paying attention to any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's all wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
